howToConfigureOutputPath: Leave it blank for default, otherwise use full path

metadata.caseType: batteryCase==1 battery populated; flexLoadCase==1 house participates; both == 0 base case
metadata.agent_debug_mode: ON==1 for allowing only hvac or only wh participation within flexLoadCase
metadata.ames: true == ames running, false == pypower running opf
metadata.solver: The name for the solver for ames
metadata.priceSensLoad: true == Substation load is flexible, false == only inflexible load
metadata.windPower: true == wind power, false == no wind power
metadata.noScale: FNCS gld_scale set to 1 if false
metadata.curve: FNCS no curve if set to false
metadata.curtail: true = curtail renewables when needed, false = no curtailment
metadata.genLowerLimit: Set generation lower limit in MVA
metadata.zonalReserves: true = has zonal reserves, false == does not have zonal reserves
metadata.metricsFullDetail: level of reporting detail you want -> false for limited, true for full level of detail
metadata.renewables: Set of renewable names, those can be 'wind', 'solar'
metadata.keyLoad: The key to be used for the load player -> refLoadMn, readLoadHr or indLoad, should be sync with Startdate

players.refLoadMn: Load player settings for the whole load in minutes, used to find industrial load in base case
players.refLoadHr: Load player settings for the whole load in hours, used to find industrial load in base case
players.indLoad: Load player settings for the industrial load
players.gldLoad: Load player settings for the gridlab load

playerStructure: load (bool) true = straight lookup, false = generator lookup using gen array
metadata.StartTime: Start time for the simulation run in the form of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
metadata.EndTime: End time for the simulation run in the form of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
metadata.Tmax: The duration for the simulation in seconds
metadata.Period: Time interval for the simulation in seconds for opf/ames
metadata.dt: The delta time for the simulation in seconds for pf
metadata.solarPPlayerFile: solar active power data to be injected in gridlabd
metadata.solarQPlayerFile: solar reactive power data to be injected in gridlabd; if 'no_file' means 0 reactive power
metadata.solarAgentForecastFile: 1 hour tape of rooftop ground truth with uncertainty (forecast error) added.  This is what will be read into the PV (unresponsive) agent with a scaling factor
metadata.DSO: An array for each substation instance [bus id, name, gld_scale, Pnom, Qnom, curve_scale, curve_skew, Pinit, Qinit]
